definition[0]: a mass of small bubbles on the top of a liquid
example[0]: ‘Excellent beer, ’ he said, wiping the froth from his mouth.
definition[1]: small white bubbles of saliva around a person’s or animal’s mouth
definition[2]: talk or ideas that are attractive but have no real value or meaning
example[1]: The book has too much froth and not enough fact.
definition[3]: if a liquid froths, it produces or contains a lot of small bubbles on top
example[2]: When you first open the bottle the beer will froth for a few seconds.
definition[4]: if someone’s mouth froths, saliva comes out as small white bubbles
